name: Monster World IV RPG
description:
Monster World IV RPG is a role-playing game with combat directly inspired by the ever so popular ATB (Active Time Battle) system introduced in Final Fantasy IV, but with its own unique gimmicks.

Experience a crossover between Wonder Boy and Final Fantasy, crafted by the developer of Shantae and Asha: Dream Fantasia!

Note

The game is currently in alpha format, but is pretty robust in functionality with battles. Have fun!
